mapper.select: select notice_no, admin_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date, notice_view from notice order by notice_no asc
mapper.insert: insert into notice (notice_no, admin_id, notice_title, notice_content,notice_date,notice_view ) values (notice_no_seq.NEXTVAL,#{adminId},#{noticeTitle},#{noticeContent},sysdate,0)
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET notice_view = notice_view+1 where notice_no = #{noticeNo}
